title: Brand New House for Sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Brand new house offering pleasant view of paddy fields conveniently located only 300 meters away from Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda; within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. The house offers extensive living space along with four bedrooms and four bathrooms. Features include a spacious living & dining area, separate pantry and wet kitchen, rooftop terrace and double garage.

The house has been strategically positioned and is directly facing a paddy field while offerring clear views from the living area, bedrooms and rooftop terrace. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in a quiet residential neighborhood.

- Four spacious bedrooms. All bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Four bathrooms equipped with electric hot water.
- Pantry equipped with fitted cupboards and separate wet kitchen.
- Spacious living and dining area.
- Rooftop terrace with spectacular view.
- Separate maids room & bathroom.
- Electric roller garage door with two covered parking spaces.
- Security system & CCTV system to be installed.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
